title: Naval Vessel Identification
description: An analyst must use a combination of radar data and Electronic Support Measures (ESM) to identify a warship operating without a transponder.

tasks.description: Analyze the warship's radar cross-section (RCS) signature.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst correctly characterizes the RCS of the target.

tasks.description: Analyze the ship's electronic emissions (e.g., radar type) collected by ESM.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst correctly identifies the type of radar systems the ship is using.

tasks.description: Fuse the RCS and ESM data and compare against a database to identify the specific class of warship.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst makes a high-confidence identification of the warship class.
